subject: Personal Finance
title: Globalization Pros and Cons
description: A short lesson to help you apply Globalization Pros and Cons.

hook.text: Your iPhone was designed in California, assembled in China, with parts from 43 countries.

buildup.text: Globalization has connected economies, lowered prices, and lifted billions out of poverty.

discovery.text: Since 1990, extreme poverty dropped from 36% to under 10% globally â€” largely due to trade and globalization.

twist.text: But it hollowed out manufacturing in wealthy nations and created massive inequality within countries.

climax.text: COVID supply chain disruptions showed the fragility of global dependence. Resilience has a cost too.

punchline.text: Globalization: more wealth, more inequality, more fragility.

quiz.question: What is a major benefit of globalization?
